content: Remember that we tried to automatically set the messages' height when they contained an image preview? Unfortunately, a CSS fix caused performance issues and we had to revert it.
I just had an idea: couldn't we specify the height in the element's style attribute from the backend? When the preview is processed.
So, we could address this in a different way, by resizing the images on the backend (problem is primarily when people upload super-small screenshots)
Yeah, that approach might also be an option
We'd want to tweak the Attachment model to store the image's height to support that
I'm going to create an issue for that; I'll probably claim it since it looks like something very interesting.
Oh, I just remembered I had already created one back in GCI. We should reopen #3097.
